name: lineFragmentRect(forProposedRect:at:writingDirection:remaining:)
desc: Returns the bounds of a line fragment rectangle inside the text container for the proposed rectangle.
declaration:
func lineFragmentRect(forProposedRect proposedRect: CGRect, 
                   at characterIndex: Int, 
     writingDirection baseWritingDirection: NSWritingDirection, 
            remaining remainingRect: UnsafeMutablePointer<CGRect>?) -> CGRect
